column4: Ok, Ubuntu = Garbage right, is there anyone here that has had Ubuntu constantly lock the system up and display weird pixelated color around the screen, no matter what verion they used, on LiveCD or installed on a HDD?
Ubuntu = Garbage right now* (sorry, i am currently using a Laptop)
How do i check if my CPU is going bad?
or my RAM, or my HDD?
have you checked the log files in /var/log/              ?
well i think Sun has delivered a computer or two without windows as well. :)
